description: The initiative Mouzouna Poulaillers is a farm that is part of the Moroccan Network of Agroecological Initiatives (RIAM). It focuses on sustainable poultry farming, producing 80-90% of feed on-site to ensure organic practices. The project, started four years ago, emphasizes self-sufficiency and profitability through organic chicken and egg sales. Additionally, it supports community empowerment by providing workshops for youth and helping local women market their products, fostering a holistic approach to agriculture and entrepreneurship.
name: Mouzouna Poulaillers
